session.objective: Create 3 atomic PRs for untracked workspace files: gitignore housekeeping, review artifacts, task-planner agent

updateMemory.notes: Session context captured in session log

outcomes: PR: feat/task-planner-agent - GitHub Copilot task-planner agent definition

decisions.decision: Grouped 8 untracked files into 3 PRs by logical concern
decisions.rationale: Atomic commits: gitignore (housekeeping), review artifacts (documentation), agent def (feature)

decisions.decision: Excluded .cache/ and .coverage via .gitignore rather than committing
decisions.rationale: Runtime artifacts from pytest and codex-monitor should not be tracked

nextSteps: Verify .cache/ and .coverage no longer appear in git status after gitignore PR merges
